00083 JsonFilter::JsonFilter(const edm::ParameterSet& iConfig):
00084   jsonFileName(iConfig.getParameter<std::string>("jsonFileName"))
00085 {
00086    //now do what ever initialization is needed
00087   // Json file map 
00088   std::cout << "jsonFileName: " << jsonFileName << std::endl;
00089   if( jsonFileName != "none" && jsonFileName.size()>1 )
00090     {
00091       edm::LogInfo("ZNtupleDumper") << "Read json file >>>"<< jsonFileName  << "<<<";
00092       readJsonFile(jsonFileName);
00093     }
00094 
00095 }

00111 // ------------ method called on each new Event  ------------
00112 bool JsonFilter::filter(edm::Event& iEvent, const edm::EventSetup& iSetup)
00113 {
00114   using namespace edm;
00115   
00116   Int_t         runNumber = iEvent.id().run();
00117   Int_t         lumiBlock =   iEvent.luminosityBlock();
00118 
00119   return AcceptEventByRunAndLumiSection( runNumber, lumiBlock,
00120                                          jsonMap);
00121     
00122 }

00167 void JsonFilter::readJsonFile(const std::string& inFileName)
00168 {
00169   jsonMap.clear();
00170   std::ifstream inFile(inFileName.c_str(), std::ios::in);
00171   
00172   std::string line;
00173   while(!inFile.eof())
00174     {
00175       std::string buffer;
00176       inFile >> buffer;
00177       line += buffer;
00178     }
00179 
00180     
00181   
00182   // loop on Json file
00183   for(std::string::const_iterator it = line.begin(); it < line.end(); ++it)
00184     {
00185       // find run number
00186       if( (*(it) == '"') && (*(it+7) == '"') )   
00187         {
00188           std::string run(it+1, it+7);
00189           //std::cout << "found run " << run << std::endl;
00190           
00191           
00192           
00193           // find lumi sections
00194           std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > lumisections;
00195           for(std::string::const_iterator it2 = it+10; it2 < line.end(); ++it2)
00196             {
00197               if( (*(it2) == ']') && (*(it2-1) == ']') ) break;
00198               if( *(it2) != '[' ) continue;
00199               
00200               std::string::const_iterator it_beg = it2;
00201               std::string::const_iterator it_mid;
00202               std::string::const_iterator it_end;
00203               
00204               for(std::string::const_iterator it3 = it_beg; it3 < line.end(); ++it3)
00205                 {
00206                   if( *(it3) == ',' ) it_mid = it3;
00207                   if( *(it3) == ']' )
00208                     {
00209                       it_end = it3;
00210                       break;
00211                     }
00212                 }
00213               
00214               std::string lumi_beg(it_beg+1, it_mid);
00215               std::string lumi_end(it_mid+1, it_end);
00216 #ifdef DEBUG
00217               std::cout << "[" << lumi_beg;
00218               std::cout << ",";
00219               std::cout << lumi_end << "]" << std::endl;
00220 #endif
00221               std::pair<int, int> tempLS(atoi(lumi_beg.c_str()), atoi(lumi_end.c_str()));
00222               lumisections.push_back(tempLS);
00223               
00224               it2 = it_end;
00225             }
00226 
00227 #ifdef DEBUG      
00228           std::cout << run.c_str() << "\t" << atoi(run.c_str()) << "\t"  << std::endl;
00229 #endif
00230           jsonMap[atoi(run.c_str())] = lumisections;
00231 
00232         } // find run number
00233       
00234     } // loop on Json file
00235   
00236   
00237   
00238   return;
00239 }

00242 
00243 bool JsonFilter::AcceptEventByRunAndLumiSection(const int& runId, const int& lumiId,
00244                                     std::map<int, std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > >& jsonMap)
00245 {
00246   // select by runId
00247   if(jsonMap.size()==0) return true;
00248   if( jsonMap.count(runId) == 0 ) return false;
00249   
00250 #ifdef DEBUG 
00251   std::cout << "runNumber = " << runId << std::endl;
00252 #endif
00253 
00254   // select by lumiId
00255   std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > lumisections = jsonMap[runId];
00256   
00257   int skipEvent = true;
00258   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < lumisections.size(); ++i)
00259     if( (lumiId >= lumisections.at(i).first) &&
00260         (lumiId <= lumisections.at(i).second) )
00261       skipEvent = false;
00262   
00263   if( skipEvent == true ) return false;
00264   
00265   
00266   return true;
00267 }

00270 // ------------ method fills 'descriptions' with the allowed parameters for the module  ------------
00271 void
00272 JsonFilter::fillDescriptions(edm::ConfigurationDescriptions& descriptions) {
00273   //The following says we do not know what parameters are allowed so do no validation
00274   // Please change this to state exactly what you do use, even if it is no parameters
00275   edm::ParameterSetDescription desc;
00276   desc.add<std::string>("jsonFileName","");
00277   //desc.setUnknown();
00278   descriptions.addDefault(desc);
00279 }
